sources.full: Virgil's Guide to the Lower Planes

resist.special: bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Command Undead (3/day)
entries: All undead within a 60ft radius must make an Intelligence saving throw {@dc 12} or be under the dullahan's control for 1 hour. Undead with an Intelligence score below 8 automatically fail this save.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the dullahan moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the dullahan can make another attack with its horse's hooves against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Headless
entries: The dullahan can survive without its head and can throw it up to 30 ft. All abilities that originate from the dullahan are centered on the head, other than Spine Whip.

action.name: Spine Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Call of the Grave
entries: One creature within 30ft. of the dullahan must make a Wisdom saving throw {@dc 12}. On a failure, that creature must make a death saving throw which remains until the next time the target recovers from falling {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

immune.special: bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The knight devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the knight devil reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the knight devil can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make another attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight devil makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hellish Leap
entries: The knight devil leaps to a point within 60 ft. of it. When it lands, all creatures within 10 ft. of it must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity save or take 36 ({@damage 6d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a successful save.

resist.special: bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks

action.name: Bile
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 5d4 + 4}) necrotic damage. Target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution save or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the cacodemon's next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

immune.special: bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Conjuration Adept
entries: The beckoner has advantage on concentration checks made to control the demons it summons.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The beckoner has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beckoner makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Necrotic Reave
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/60 ft., one target. {@h}37 ({@damage 6d8 + 10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Evade
entries: If the beckoner is targeted by an effect, it can use its reaction to move up to its speed in order to try and evade the attacker's range.

immune.special: bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: The marauder's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage on a hit.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The marauder has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marauder makes two argent greataxe attacks.

action.name: Summon Hound (3/day)
entries: The marauder summons a spectral companion to aid it in battle. This companion counts as an elemental, not a beast, and is medium instead of large.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 17 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage. The marauder can fire its hand crossbow as a bonus action.

action.name: Argent Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d12 + 6}) slashing damage, plus 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) necrotic damage.

reaction.name: Argent Shield {@recharge 5}
entries: As a reaction, the marauder adds +4 to its AC until the start of its next turn.
